Title: Login button not responding on mobile
Description: Login button fails to trigger on iOS Safari
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open app on iOS Safari 2. Navigate to login 3. Tap login button 4. Nothing happens

Title: Add dark mode support
Description: Users have requested dark mode theme support

Title: API response time too slow
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Call GET /api/users 2. Observe response time 3. See 5+ second delay

Title: Implement user notifications
Description: Add real-time notification system for user activities

Title: Database connection pool exhausted
Description: Connection pool runs out under heavy load
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Simulate 100 concurrent users 2. Observe connection errors 3. See pool exhausted message

Title: Update dependencies to latest versions
Description: Security audit requires updating npm packages

Title: Improve search performance
Description: Search queries need optimization for large datasets

Title: Fix memory leak in dashboard
Description: Dashboard component leaks memory over time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open dashboard 2. Leave open for 1 hour 3. Observe memory usage increase

Title: Add export to CSV feature
Description: Users need to export data to CSV format

Title: Refactor authentication module
Description: Current auth code is hard to maintain

Title: Fix timezone handling in reports
Description: Reports show wrong times for non-UTC users
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Set timezone to PST 2. Generate report 3. See incorrect timestamps

Title: Add API rate limiting
Description: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse
